body: Hey guys! This took me SO long to make!!!!! Even though its very short its very complicated. Here is my new intro! (Made with Action Script 3.0 Flash) Here is the link to the Flash Intro, for my youtube account! Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VIexHHJP28Q Feedback is greatly appreciated!
